name: Bind
description:
Living among so many people in society nowadays is full of commitments. 

People apply judgment against the people who they meet. Both the prejudge and the judge  bound us by those negative words to the point that we can't flee and destroy our freedom. How the longer the days, the negative feelings only increase. These bonds don't only induce our pride but even ruin who we are. It also slashes and stabs us inside and we can't escape from the outside as well.

The words in the image are all negative behavior of human in talkin fashion in Thai Language. There are "SLANDER", "PREJUDICE", "JEALOUS", "CURSE", "COMDEMN", "REVILE", "INSULT", "CONTEMPT", and etc..
